import React,{Compo} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './SignIn.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export default class Signin extends Component { state = { title:Signin } handleSubmit= e => { e.preventDefault(); const data ={ username :this.prenom, password:this.motdepasse, langue1:this.Langue1, lvl1:this.Niveau1, langue2:this.Langue2, lvl2:this.Niveau2, }; Axios.post('http://localhost:4000/register',data).then( res => { console.log(res); } ).catch( err=> { console.log(err); } ) console.log(data); } render() { return (

Rejoins LingoPeer!

Données Personnelles
this.prenom =e.target.value}>

this.nom =e.target.value}>

this.email =e.target.value} >

this.motdepasse =e.target.value}>

this.conf =e.target.value} >

) } }
